## Description

A clear description of the feature you'd like.

## Use Case

Why is this feature needed? What problem does it solve?

## Redis Command Reference

If requesting a new Redis command, link to the official documentation:
- Command: `COMMAND_NAME`
- Docs: https://redis.io/commands/command-name

## Proposed Implementation

(Optional) How you think this could be implemented, considering MicroPython and memory constraints.

## Alternatives Considered

Any alternative approaches you've considered.
